narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This is the 1st pre license inspection for a Class A license. 
Record keeping and identification requirements were explained the applicant.
Conducting regulated activity without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
